newsitem.title: UK: Capita Group in 7.25 mln stg acquisition.
newsitem.headline: Capita Group in 7.25 mln stg acquisition.

text.p: Capita Group Plc on Friday said it agreed to acquire Recruitment and Assessment Services Ltd for 7.25 million stg from the UK government.

Capita said it is setting a placing to raise 7.4 million stg, inclusive of expenses, with 1.85 million new ordinary shares to be placed at 400 pence each. The placing is being underwritten by Close Brothers.
The acquisition is expected to make a positive contribution to 1997 earnings, the company said. Recruitment and Assessment Servies had net assets of 1.06 million stg at March 31.

"We are delighted to have won the responsibility to own and manage this important government agency, and we are confident that we can develop the business of RAS across both the public and private sectors," Capita chairman Rod Aldridge said in a statement.
